comment: Dr. Frisch is the adviser for students in the MAT biology program. She cares about their success and provides prompt, helpful feedback. She goes above and beyond in addressing the needs of her students and builds her course around these needs. She appreciates hard work and WILL challenge her students, but she also understands that life happens.
Awesome Professor! Her tests are tough but you actually learn in her class! If you're an ECE major, get into her class if at all possible! You won't regret it!
I have no bad things to say about her. She comes to class every day with a great attitude and that means a lot. She is so friendly and helpful and truly want you to succeed. highly recommend.

Dr. Frisch is a great teacher! I am not a science fan but in her class I actually enjoyed learning! Her tests are hard but you just need to study like any other test. She gives you multiple oppurtunities to make a good grade in her class. I would recommend taking her!

Mrs. Frisch is a great teacher! She is so funny and nice, and really helps you out. She drops the two lowest quizes, and if you do well on the final she'll drop the lowest test grade too. I highly recommend taking her because she's not only a great teacher but a great person as well.
Dr. Frisch is awesome! I loved her class, she is really nice and so helpful. The test are challenging, but you just have to study. I would take her again and completely recommend her!

She is a good science teacher. Is passionate and knowledgeable. Always many opportunities to learn. With that aside- She is rude. Mumbles when she talks, has low self esteem etc etc. And last time I checked- Professors are not allowed to add assignments after the syllabus has been handed out. She did this. I'm glad this semester is almost over.

She is awesome!! Take her!! Her tests follow what she teaches in class, so as long as you attend, you will be fine. She also give practice tests prior to the real ones, and she lets you do test corrections. Gives weekly quizzes that help keep your grade up. Fun to be around, and always cheerful!!

She is a wonderful professor.  She loves the subject and wants everyone to fully understand what's being taught.  If one person has a question, she will go over it again, making sure everyone understands.  It's not an easy A, but you really learn from it.  She is always willing to help out, even for the slackers.  Take her.  You will learn a lot!

shes a great teacher, held my interest and kept the class fun. not an easy A, but it is manageable! STUDY for the tests and dont miss class, shes explains everything! i would reccommend her if youre looking to learn alot !

Wonderful teacher, passionate about the subject, keeps my attention the entire time. Test are difficult only if you do not study. Labs are last the entire time. She will help guide you but does not tell you the answer point blank. At the end, she will summarize the labs (if you stick around and do not leave early). Overall, great class.

She's fun, and makes being in class fun and interesting, and she's always willing to help you. The labs last the full 2 hours and she won't give you the answers so they can get frustrating some times. Take notes or print the ppt of line. but otherwise she's ok

Do YOURSELF A FAVOR, AND DON'T TAKE HER. She is not very clear explaining the subject, but she will help you if you go to her office. Her tests are really really hard, but she allows test corrections. You can do best, and still get a B or C in a class. Class is boring, and she makes you hate science even more.
she is willing to always help.  Gives you a chance to make up points on tests. Always in a good mood and makes the material  fun to learn.
